message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this amazing product. I think it's a game-changer and I believe it will bring a lot of value to your business. As we're just getting started, I'm willing to make a competitive offer to get us off on the right foot. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $900,000.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I see the value in your product, $900,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this stage. I'd be happy to pay $750,000 for it.  Let me know your thoughts.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that $900,000 is a bit steep for you, but I'm still confident that my product will bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer a price of $850,000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider, and I think it's still a great deal for both of us.
